nodes.documentation:
@title FreezableImplementationDirectory
@dev Implementation directory which can be made irreversibly immutable by the owner.
nodes.name: FreezableImplementationDirectory

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot perform action for a frozen implementation directory"

arguments.value: Cannot perform action for a frozen implementation directory

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot perform action for a frozen implementation directory"

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier that allows functions to be called only before the contract is frozen.
nodes.name: whenNotFrozen

nodes.documentation:
@dev Makes the directory irreversibly immutable.
It can only be called once, by the owner.
nodes.name: freeze
setImplementation
unsetImplementation
